#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int combinations(int n)
{
	int k=3;
	if(k*2>n)
	k=n-k;
	int result=n;
	for(int i=2;i<=k;i++)
	{
		result*=(n-i+1);
		result/=i;
	}
	return result;
};
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,n,l,p,o,x;
	cin>>x;
	while(x--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		l=combinations(n*4);
		if(n>=3)
		p=4*combinations(n);
		else
		p=0;
		cout<<l-p<<endl;
	}
}
